entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is described as sitting alone at a table.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as asking Luna if they can join her.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as aiming a kick at Ron under the table.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as losing track of the conversation due to pain from Hermione's kick.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as receiving a present from Luna and Ron.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is described as dancing with Bill and receiving a present from Luna and Ron.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is mentioned as leading Madame Delacour onto the dance floor.

entities.name: madame delacour
entities.description: Madame Delacour is described as being led onto the dance floor by Mr. Weasley.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as dancing with Fleur's father.

relationships.description: Ron asks Luna if they can join her at the table.
Hermione aims a kick at Harry under the table.
Luna and Ron give Bill a present.
Mr. Weasley leads Madame Delacour onto the dance floor.
Mrs. Weasley dances with Fleur's father.
